articles.content: A traveller from Sydney has tested positive for COVID-19 after arriving in Tasmania and being directed into hotel quarantine for failing to have a valid border pass, Premier Peter Gutwein has announc… [+7479 chars]

articles.description: ‘Total embarrassment’: Olympics great lashes Team USA as 109-year curse continues
articles.content:
Team USAs handoff woes continued at Tokyo and have prompted a brutal reaction over in the States, with the execution branded a total embarrassment by nine-time gold medallist Carl Lewis.

articles.author: Tim Elbra
articles.title: Tokyo Olympics 2021: 'The Australian guy' Peter Bol lauded for gutsy 800m final run - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: Bol has one regret from stunning Olympic final
articles.content:
Peter Bol ran a wonderfully courageous race, setting the pace in the men's Olympic 800m final before slipping to fourth - a performance that has won him many fans.
Among them was the gold medallist,… [+2646 chars]
